title: Abe George Kattobi Seishun Ki: Shibuya Honky Tonk
original_name: 安部譲二かっとび青春記 渋谷ホンキィトンク
opening_song: "Yasashiku Aishite (やさしく愛して)" by BORO, Sawada Kenji (沢田研二)
ending_song: "Kanashimanai de Don't Let You Down (悲しまないで Don't Let you down)" by BORO
sinopse: This story is based on one of the famous Japanese writers "George Abe"'s troubled boyhood. Although he was born in wealthy family, he starts keeping company with yakuza...
